name: Database-Candidate_Management
tagline: A complete database management functionality project for  Candidate Registration, Fee Submission and Course Enrolment ( MySQL database using XAMPP, Apache server)
body:
### Welcome to GitHub Pages.
This project deals with making a College Database Management System for (Candidate Registration) which includes  Fee Submission and Course Enrollment (MySQL database using XAMPP, Apache server,PHP) supplementing with various features for the ease of use and portability for the various environment.

### Some Graphical User Interface (GUI) Insight.
![Login](https://github.com/raj-maurya/Database-Frontend-backend-Mysql-Project/blob/master/screen_shots/front1.PNG?raw=true)

![After Login front screen](https://github.com/raj-maurya/Database-Frontend-backend-Mysql-Project/blob/master/screen_shots/front2.PNG?raw=true)

![Next Screen](https://github.com/raj-maurya/Database-Frontend-backend-Mysql-Project/blob/master/screen_shots/front4.PNG?raw=true)

![Other Update GUI finctionality](https://github.com/raj-maurya/Database-Frontend-backend-Mysql-Project/blob/master/screen_shots/front6.PNG?raw=true)

![Database Schema](https://github.com/raj-maurya/Database-Frontend-backend-Mysql-Project/blob/master/screen_shots/schema1.PNG?raw=true)

![SQL result](https://github.com/raj-maurya/Database-Frontend-backend-Mysql-Project/blob/master/screen_shots/schema3.PNG?raw=true)
### Authors and Contributors
Raj Maurya (@raj-maurya) In 2015. All are welcome to modify this project to include new features as required.

### Support or Contact
Share your ideas to make this project more helpful in understanding the concepts of Database Management System at rajkmaurya111@gmail.com
